verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou hast <S%H2713>searched<s%> me, and <S%H3045>known<s%> me.
Thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> my <S%H3427>downsitting<s%> and mine <S%H6965>uprising<s%>, thou <S%H995>understandest<s%> my <S%H7454>thought<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.
Thou <S%H2219>compassest<s%> my <S%H734>path<s%> and my lying <S%H7252>down<s%>, and art <S%H5532>acquainted<s%> with all my <S%H1870>ways<s%>. compassest: or, winnowest
For there is not a <S%H4405>word<s%> in my <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, but, lo, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> it altogether.
Thou hast <S%H6696>beset<s%> me <S%H268>behind<s%> and <S%H6924>before<s%>, and <S%H7896>laid<s%> thine <S%H3709>hand<s%> upon me.
Such <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is too <S%H6383>wonderful<s%> <S%H6383><s%> for me; it is <S%H7682>high<s%>, I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> attain unto it.
Whither shall I <S%H3212>go<s%> from thy <S%H7307>spirit<s%>? or whither shall I <S%H1272>flee<s%> from thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>?
If I ascend <S%H5266>up<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, thou art there: if I make my <S%H3331>bed<s%> in <S%H7585>hell<s%>, behold, thou art there.
If I <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning<s%>, and <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the uttermost <S%H319>parts<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>;
Even there shall thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> me, and thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall <S%H270>hold<s%> me.
If I <S%H559>say<s%>, Surely the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall <S%H7779>cover<s%> me; even the <S%H3915>night<s%> shall be <S%H216>light<s%> about <S%H1157>me<s%>.

Yea, the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> <S%H2821>hideth<s%> not from thee; but the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H215>shineth<s%> as the <S%H3117>day<s%>: the <S%H2825>darkness<s%> and the <S%H219>light<s%> are both alike to thee. hideth: Heb. darkeneth not the darkness and: Heb. as is the darkness, so is the light
For thou hast <S%H7069>possessed<s%> my <S%H3629>reins<s%>: thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> me in my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H990>womb<s%>.

I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee; for I am <S%H3372>fearfully<s%> and wonderfully <S%H6395>made<s%>: <S%H6381>marvellous<s%> are thy <S%H4639>works<s%>; and that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> right <S%H3966>well<s%>. right: Heb. greatly

My <S%H6108>substance<s%> was not <S%H3582>hid<s%> from thee, when I was <S%H6213>made<s%> in <S%H5643>secret<s%>, and curiously <S%H7551>wrought<s%> in the lowest <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>. substance: or, strength, or, body

Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> did <S%H7200>see<s%> my substance, yet being <S%H1564>unperfect<s%>; and in thy <S%H5612>book<s%> all my members were <S%H3789>written<s%>, which in <S%H3117>continuance<s%> were <S%H3335>fashioned<s%>, when as yet there was <S%H259>none<s%> of them. all: Heb. all of them which: or, what days they should be fashioned
How <S%H3365>precious<s%> also are thy <S%H7454>thoughts<s%> unto me, O <S%H410>God<s%>! how <S%H6105>great<s%> is the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of them!
If I should <S%H5608>count<s%> them, they are more in <S%H7235>number<s%> than the <S%H2344>sand<s%>: when I <S%H6974>awake<s%>, I am <S%H5750>still<s%> with thee.
Surely thou wilt <S%H6991>slay<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, O <S%H433>God<s%>: <S%H5493>depart<s%> from me therefore, ye <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>.
For they <S%H559>speak<s%> against thee <S%H4209>wickedly<s%>, and thine <S%H6145>enemies<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> thy name in <S%H7723>vain<s%>.
Do not I <S%H8130>hate<s%> them, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee? and am not I <S%H6962>grieved<s%> with those that rise <S%H8618>up<s%> against thee?
I <S%H8130>hate<s%> them with <S%H8503>perfect<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%>: I count them mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
<S%H2713>Search<s%> me, O <S%H410>God<s%>, and <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%>: <S%H974>try<s%> me, and <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H8312>thoughts<s%>:
And <S%H7200>see<s%> if there be any <S%H6090>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> in me, and <S%H5148>lead<s%> me in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>. wicked: Heb. way of pain, or, grief
